txt.en: 'Good to see you [placeholder]. Kergrim to the far north-west in Tûkurdul, near Ashâgir, ransacked a shipment from the west. They took the driver and the contents of his haul with them. I ask of you that you save the driver and recover his supplies if you can. As well as slay any kergim who cross your path.'
You have successfully recovered the ransacked supplies in Tûkurdul! Return with the scout to Raphûz with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to travel to Tûkurdul and recover what you can from the ransacked shipment as well as save the driver from the kergrim.
'[placeholder], your task is to travel to Tûkurdul and recover what you can from the ransacked shipment, and if they are alive, bring the driver back safely.'
'You have my thanks for recovering what supplies you could. They will be of use here in Ub Nishir.\n\n'Sad to hear about the driver's fate, I am sorry you were unable to save him.'
Complete Mission: Kergrim on the Road
Your mission is to travel to Tûkurdul and recover what you can from the ransacked shipment as well as save the driver from the kergrim.\n\nSpeak with Raphûz to travel.
